titleStmt.title: The third and last volume of the sermons of Mr. Stephen Crisp late of Colchester Essex, deceased containing XII declarations upon several divine subjects : exactly taken in short-hand as they were deliver'd by him at the publick meeting-houses of the people called Quakers ... and now faithfully transcribed and published : with some of his prayers after sermon.
titleStmt.author: Crisp, Stephen, 1628-1692.

notesStmt.note: Pages stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
